message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this item for $18,000. I believe it offers significant value at this price point. What do you think?
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $10,000. I'm willing to pay that price for the value it offers.
Bob, I appreciate your interest.  While I understand your perspective on the value, $10,000 is significantly below my bottom line. Could you do $15,000?
I appreciate your flexibility, but I'm still a bit above $10,000. I can do $12,000, but that's as high as I'm willing to go. Can we meet in the middle at $12,000?
